metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21861 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: An exploitable integer truncation vulnerability exists within the MPEG-4decoding functionality of the GPAC Project on Advanced Content libraryv1.0.1. When processing the 'hdlr' FOURCC code, a specially crafted MPEG-4input can cause an improper memory allocation resulting in a heap-basedbuffer overflow that causes memory corruption. An attacker can convince auser to open a video to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gpac package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
